## RequestMapping() function

Routes HTTP requests to the specified path.

**Signature:**

```typescript

    routerName?: string;
    middleware?: Function[];
}) => MethodDecorator
```

## RequestMapping() function

**Signature:**

```typescript

    routerName?: string;
```
